PageTitle: Best Online Office Suite | ONLYOFFICE Docs
PageDescription: Work on all kinds of Office documents, create and fill out forms anywhere anytime.
Header: Create, edit, and collaborate on documents anywhere, any time
Subheader: ONLYOFFICE Docs, a powerful online editor for text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, forms and PDF for the platform you use
Designed: <0>Designed</0> to accommodate users of all abilities
CreateText: Create complex <0>documents</0>, professional <1>spreadsheets</1>, stunning <2>presentations</2>. Build fillable <3>forms</3> and fill them in online. View and edit <4>PDFs</4>, export/import to/from PDF. Convert docs to Markdown and HTML. Turn your textbooks into <5>ebooks</5>. View and navigate <6>diagrams</6> with ease.
EditText: Choose from multiple formatting tools, insert and edit complex objects, enhance user experience with plugins.
WorkText: Generate texts, images, and code. Get quick answers to your questions or explanation of some notions and concepts. Check your text spelling and grammar. Easily rewrite your text making it shorter or longer. Translate into different languages and do much more with integrated AI tools.
CollaborateText: Share and co-edit documents in real-time. Comment and track changes. Compare and combine docs. Chat, make audio and video calls. View and restore previous versions of your document.
CustomizeText: Scale the editors to 100%, 125%, 150%, 200%, 250%, 300%, 350%, 400%, 450%, or 500% to work comfortably on any monitor.
SwitchToDark: Switch to Dark theme if you are working in a low-light environment.
